revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F4G08ABAFA; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI NOR |fla2chip = Winbond;; |flash2size = 4 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5AN8G6NCJ-RVKC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E2110;88E2110-BWS4; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E2110;88E2110-BWS4; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 2.5GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Marvell (NXP);88W9064;M, 88W9064-BWP2, TW; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 4804 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48RXAM03.SGB" and "2020.03.18" is silkscreened on the board.
*[[Wistron NeWeb RXAM-JD1]] - 802.11abgn/ac/ax Access Point :FCC ID: NKRRXAM-JD1 (2020-08-04)
===Product Specifications=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] ([[Cavium]]) CN9130-1600-NG-AUS-G :[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/03/06/marvell-octeon-tx2-cn9130-cn9131-and-cn9132-socs-target-5g-base-stations-edge-networking-storage-applications/ ''Octeon TX2''] [https://www.marvell.com/products/infrastructure-processors/multi-core-processors/octeon-tx2/octeon-tx2-cn9130.html CN9130] (4x ARM Cortex-A72) *Flash: 512MB ''Micron'' (NAND), 4MB (SPI NOR) *RAM: 2GB ''SK hynix'' 2x 1GB chips (SDRAM DDR4) *WLAN: 2x [[Marvell]] ([[NXP]]) 88W9064-A1-BWP2 (2.4/5GHz) *LAN: 2x [[Marvell]] 88E2110-A0-BWS4 C000 (mGiga PHY) *Ethernet: 2x 1.0/2.5 GbE ports, supports PoE 802.3at *Antennas: 4x Dual-band antennas, 1x 2.4GHz antenna *PCB: Six-Layer; Dimensions: 192 × 146 × 1.6 (mm) *Outer Dimensions: 220 × 220 × 42 (mm)
==See also== *[[Catapult TECH 815-00027]] :FCC ID: NKR-RAAME1 (2019-07-08) *[[Verizon LRV5-100]] :FCC ID: NKR-LRV5-100 (2018-09-28), NKR-IMG2 *[[Verizon LVM1]] :FCC ID: NKR-LVSK-M1 (2019-12-24) *[[Verizon LVR1 (5G Home Router)]] :FCC ID: NKR-LVSK-R1 (2019-12-23) *[[Verizon LVX1]] :FCC ID: NKR-LVSK-X1 (2019-12-23) *[[Wistron NeWeb CC1]] :FCC ID: NKR-CC1 (2019-02-20) <!-- *NKR-LVSK-R2 (Verizon) *NKR-LVSK-X1 (2019-12-23) Wi-Fi Extender Mini (Verizon) *NKR-LVSK-R1 (2019-12-23) Router (Verizon) *NKR-A3 (2019-12-19) WiFi Module *NKR-P68 (2019-12-04) Wireless Module *NKR-WNCJS8T Madesafe/IoT Gateway *NKR-LVSK-ODU (2019-07-08) LVSKODU (Verizon) *NKR-P11 (2019-06-13) Wireless LAN Module *NKR-SWA52 (2019-05-09) Wireless Audio Module *NKR-CC1 (2019-02-20) Access Point (AP)
